traits.Description: Feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. They will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break

traits.Description: They are a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. Their carefree personality has kept them from developing class abilities. Instead, they have learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow them to adapt to any situation. Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, the wanderlust will cause them to suvver a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long
traits.Stats: Move speed +0.2, Global work speed -10%, Immunity gain speed +20%, Psychic sensitivity +10%, Mental break threshold -3%, Max comfortable temp +5.4F [3C], Min comfortable temp +5.4F [3C]

traits.Description: Able to manifest physical and demonic forces using their unique access to arcane power. The warlock shars the same genetic mixture as a succubus, but as a mal, they are affected with mental enhancements that include clairvoyance and telekineses. The warlock can occasionally affect the outcome of a social interaction using their mental capabilities, regardless of how the interaction actually occurred

traits.Description: They are a wayfarer; a self-disciplined fighter that excels at tricks and dirty fighting. Their carefree personality has kept her from developing class abilities. Instead, they have learned to improve a vast number of utility abilities that allow them to adapt to any situation. Wayfarers prefer the open road and will gain a mood boost for being in a caravan, and any caravan with a wayfarer will travel 25% faster. However, wayfarers will suffer a mood penalty if they remain in a colony for too long
